game.name: Total War: SHOGUN 2 - Sengoku Jidai Unit Pack
game.shortDescription: The Total War: SHOGUN 2 Sengoku Jidai Unit Pack adds 10 new elite units for use across the different game modes of SHOGUN 2. Once you've purchased the content, you will unlock all 10 of these versatile units in single and multiplayer Campaign mode under the conditions stated below.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Total War: SHOGUN 2 Sengoku Jidai Unit Pack adds 10 new elite units for use across the different game modes of SHOGUN 2. Once you've purchased the content, you will unlock all 10 of these versatile units in single and multiplayer Campaign mode under the conditions stated below.
game.developers: The Creative Assembly, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
